arts.ttl: Champions League — Newcastle vs. Benfica – Match Preview
arts.sum: Newcastle United host Benfica at St James’ Park on Tuesday aiming to follow up their 4-0 win over Union SG with another step toward the Champions League knockout stage. Eddie Howe’s team lost their opener to Barcelona but responded strongly in Belgium, and a second win would move them closer to qualification. Benfica arrive without […]

arts.ttl: Jose Mourinho pays beautiful tribute to Sir Bobby Robson on Newcastle visit
arts.sum: Jose Mourinho's Benfica take on Newcastle at St James' Park in the Champions League on Tuesday, and he spoke about his former mentor, Sir Bobby Robson, during his pre-match press conference

arts.ttl: Newcastle United v Benfica: Youngster catches eye as he’s included in Champions League squad
arts.sum: José Mourinho is taking a touch of youth to St James’ Park. According to A Bola, Benfica have travelled to England with a 25-man squad to face Newcastle United in the Champions League, and one name stands out: Ivan Lima. arts.ttl: ‘Little Magpie’ José Mourinho relishing taking Benfica to Newcastle | Louise Taylor
arts.sum: Portuguese has a long-held affinity with the north-east club following his time working with Sir Bobby Robson at Barcelona To José Mourinho, Newcastle United represents a road never taken. Whenever Mourinho visits St James’ Park he takes time to stand by the statue of Sir Bobby Robson outside the Milburn Stand and spend a few minutes paying silent tribute to the memory of his mentor. In 1999 Robson wanted the Portuguese to join him at Newcastle as an assistant manager with a view to eventually taking the top job but Mourinho, who returns to north‑east England for a Champions League engagement with Benfica on Tuesday night, declined.
